mapper.sql: select t.rec_id as dictValue, t.tag_name as dictLabel, t.tag_desc, t.rec_status, t.rec_person, t.rec_time, t.rec_updateperson, t.rec_updatetime, u.nick_name as user_name from d_customer_tag t left join sys_user u on t.rec_person=u.user_name
mapper.select:
where t.rec_status='1'
and t.tag_name like concat('%',#{tag_name},'%')
order by t.rec_updatetime desc
